name: Mushroom Between Us
description:
This game is playable on Mac or Windows with keyboard/mouse or a controller (any Xbox or Playstation-type controller should do). 

Help the Mushroom Man shoot needed items to his neighboring planets indicated by the flags they fly. As you successfully deliver items to your neighbors in need, you'll receive items that spruce up your home planet.  

This is a short game created for PIGSquad's 9th Birthday Game Jam. 

Here are the controller instructions: 

and here are the keyboard/mouse instructions: 


"Q" Make tutorial-graphic appear/disappear 
"E" switch between run and shoot mode
"A,S,W,D" run directions in run mode
Mouse to point and Left Click to shoot
"A,D" switch between items being shot <🧻,🍍,🍾> from your crossbow

Programming: Pat Farnach @PFarnach

3D Art/Animation: Mark Nerys @marknerys

Music/Sound: Peter Karman @ptrkrmn
tutorial graphics above by Peter
